meta_description: Bathroom remodeling contractor in Detroit and Metro Detroit. Custom showers, tile, vanities, tub-to-shower conversions, and full bath renovations.
og_description: Transform your Detroit bathroom with waterproofing-first remodeling and clean finishes.
keywords: bathroom remodeling Detroit, tub to shower conversion, custom shower Detroit
hero_lead: Detroit and Metro Detroit bathroom remodels with proper waterproofing, permits, and clean finishes from demo to punch list.
intro_paragraphs: Bathrooms must be watertight and code-compliant. We manage demo, plumbing, electrical, waterproofing, tile, and fixtures so your Detroit-area bathroom performs every day.
As a licensed Michigan residential builder, we coordinate trades, inspections, and materials. Expect clear pricing, firm scheduling, and a tidy jobsite.
service_image_caption: Custom bath renovation completed in Metro Detroit
services_intro: Pick the scope you need; we will build a clear plan, handle permits, and deliver a durable finish.

services_offered.title: Custom Shower Installation
services_offered.description: Tile showers with proper waterproofing, slope, and drainage for long-term performance.

services_offered.title: Tub-to-Shower Conversions
services_offered.description: Low-threshold conversions with solid backing, glass, and slip-aware flooring.

services_offered.title: Tile Work (Floors & Walls)
services_offered.description: Flat substrates, membranes where needed, and consistent grout lines for clean results.

services_offered.title: Vanity & Countertop Installation
services_offered.description: Vanities, tops, and plumbing tie-ins set level, sealed, and ready for daily use.

services_offered.title: Toilet & Fixture Installation
services_offered.description: Toilets, faucets, valves, and accessories installed with proper sealing and fastening.

services_offered.title: Lighting & Ventilation
services_offered.description: Lights, GFCI protection, and quiet fans sized for moisture control and code compliance.

services_offered.title: Waterproofing & Backer Systems
services_offered.description: Correct backer boards, membranes, and sealants to protect framing and finishes.

services_offered.title: Layout Tweaks & Storage
services_offered.description: Optimize layout, niches, shelving, and cabinetry for better daily function.

h2_benefits: Why Choose Midwest Flip for Your Bathroom Remodel?

benefits.title: Licensed Michigan Builder
benefits.description: We pull permits, schedule inspections, and build to Michigan codes.

benefits.title: Waterproofing-First
benefits.description: Proper substrates, membranes, and sealants to prevent callbacks and moisture issues.

benefits.title: Clean, Organized Jobsite
benefits.description: Daily tidy-ups, floor protection, and clear communication while we work in your home.

benefits.title: Coordinated Trades
benefits.description: Plumbing, electrical, tile, and carpentry handled in the right order to stay on schedule.

benefits.title: Transparent Pricing
benefits.description: Detailed estimates with allowances and options so you can choose finishes confidently.

process_intro: A clear, permit-ready sequence to keep your project moving and protected.

process_steps.title: Consultation & Scope
process_steps.description: Walk the existing bath, confirm goals, measure, and define budget/finish levels.

process_steps.title: Design & Selections
process_steps.description: Finalize layout, tile, fixtures, lighting, and ventilation. We clarify all line items.

process_steps.title: Permits & Prep
process_steps.description: Pull required permits and protect adjacent areas before demo begins.

process_steps.title: Demo & Rough
process_steps.description: Careful demolition, rough plumbing/electrical, blocking, and inspections.

process_steps.title: Waterproof & Tile
process_steps.description: Install backer, membranes, tile, grout, and sealant with clean lines and proper slope.

process_steps.title: Set Fixtures & Finish
process_steps.description: Vanity, tops, glass, trim, paint, and final punch so it is ready for daily use.

pricing_table.note: Costs vary by size, layout changes, and finish selections. Get a written estimate for your space.

faqs.q: Do I need permits for a bathroom remodel?
faqs.a: Yes, permits are typically required for plumbing, electrical, and structural changes. We handle the permit applications and inspections for you.

faqs.q: How long does a bathroom remodel take?
faqs.a: Most projects take 2-5 weeks depending on scope. Custom tile showers and layout changes add time for waterproofing and inspections.

faqs.q: Can you help with design and selections?
faqs.a: We guide layout, waterproofing details, and fixture selections. If you want a designer, we can coordinate with yours or recommend partners.
Yes, as long as items are compatible and on site before rough/finish stages. We can also source and manage materials for you.
Tile selections, layout changes, and plumbing/electrical upgrades drive cost. We provide options to fit your budget.

sidebar_body: Ready to upgrade your bathroom? Get a licensed Detroit remodeler to manage permits, waterproofing, and clean finishes.

meta_description: Basement waterproofing for Detroit homes: interior/exterior drains, sump pumps, crack repair, and moisture control to protect your foundation.

hero_lead: Dry, healthy basements for Detroit and Metro Detroit, with drainage, pumps, sealing, and moisture management backed by licensed builders.
h2_intro: Stop Leaks and Moisture at the Source
intro_paragraphs: Detroit basements see hydrostatic pressure, freeze-thaw, and aging masonry. We design waterproofing that matches your foundation type and site conditions.
We combine drainage, crack repair, vapor control, and proper discharge so you can finish or store with confidence.
service_image_caption: Interior drain and sump installation in Detroit
services_intro: We tailor solutions to your foundation, soil, and water patterns.

services_offered.title: Crack Injection & Sealing
services_offered.description: Epoxy or urethane injection for wall cracks and joint sealing.

services_offered.title: Vapor Barriers & Encapsulation
services_offered.description: Wall and floor vapor control for damp basements and crawlspaces.

services_offered.title: Exterior Excavation & Waterproofing
services_offered.description: Membranes, drainage board, and footing drains where exterior access is best.

services_offered.title: Grading & Downspout Management
services_offered.description: Regrade, extensions, and swales to move water away from the home.

benefits.description: We match methods to your foundation and budget; no one-size-fits-all kits.

benefits.title: Clean Work
benefits.description: Dust control, debris haul-away, and careful protection of finished areas.

benefits.title: Reliable Discharge
benefits.description: Proper routing to daylight or storm connections per local rules.

benefits.title: Clear Pricing
benefits.description: Written scopes with options for pumps, liners, and backup systems.

process_intro: Investigation first, then a solution that fits your home.

process_steps.title: Assess & Plan
process_steps.description: Inspect moisture sources, foundation type, and discharge options.

process_steps.title: Proposal & Options
process_steps.description: Written scope with options for drains, pumps, and sealing.

process_steps.title: Permits & Prep
process_steps.description: Pull permits if required; protect pathways and finished areas.

process_steps.title: Install System
process_steps.description: Drainage, pumps, sealing, and discharge completed to spec.

process_steps.title: Test & Cleanup

faqs.a: We evaluate code-compliant options for discharge to daylight or approved storm connections.
